game.name: Army of Darkness Doom (1996) (Various).dosz
game.comment: Doom II version. EXE created with DeHackEd and Doom32 (renamed to DOOM2.EXE). WAD created with DeuSF (deusf -app aoddoom2.wad)

game.name: Back to Saturn X - Episode 1 - Get out of My Stations (2012) (Esselfortium et al).dosz
game.description: Back to Saturn X - Episode 1 - Get out of My Stations
game.comment: EXE created with DeHackEd and Doom32 (renamed to DOOM2.EXE). Also includes helper WAD for Tartar

game.name: Doom Engines.dosz
game.comment: Base for Doom wads. Includes Tartar 2024-10-16, Doom32, UDoom32, FDoom32, SETUP.EXE and IPXSETUP.EXE from shareware Doom v1.9, MMOUSE.COM from Doomkid's vanilla wad collection. Needs DOS.YML with mem_size: 65536
game.comment_dosc: Sound Blaster 16 config and auto start. General MIDI, modern controls, and source port options

game.name: Doom II Mod Base.dosz
game.comment: Minimal files from Doom II v1.9

game.name: Doom Series Mod Base.dosz
game.comment: Used as a base for individual source ports. Minimal files from Ultimate Doom, Doom II, and Final Doom. Needs DOS.YML with mem_size: 65536

game.name: Doom the Way id Did (2011) (Various).dosz
game.comment: EXE created with DeHackEd and UDoom32 (renamed to DOOM.EXE)

game.name: Master Levels for Doom II (1995) (id Software) (Megawad).dosz
game.comment: Single megawad version from Doom Classic Complete (PSN)

game.name: No Rest for the Living (2010) (Nerve Software).dosz
game.comment: Original NERVE.WAD from Doom 3: BFG Edition. Also includes xttl's custom EXE, and a helper WAD for Tartar

game.name: Plutonia 2 (2008) (Plutonia 2 Team).dosz
game.comment: EXE created with DeHackEd (2020 version), FDoom32 (renamed to DOOM2.EXE), and PLUTONIA.WAD (renamed to DOOM2.WAD)

game.name: Plutonia Experiment Mod Base.dosz
game.comment: Minimal files from Final Doom (id Anthology fixed version)

game.name: Sigil (2019) (John Romero).dosz
game.comment: Freeware v1.21. Also includes xttl's custom EXE

game.name: Sigil II (2023) (John Romero).dosz
game.comment: Freeware v1.0. Also includes a helper WAD for Tartar

game.name: TNT - Evilution Mod Base.dosz
game.comment: Minimal files from Final Doom (id Anthology fixed version)

game.name: TNT - Revilution (2017) (Various).dosz
game.comment: EXE created with DeHackEd (2020 version), FDoom32 (renamed to DOOM2.EXE), and TNT.WAD (renamed to DOOM2.WAD). WAD created with DeuSF (deusf -app tntr.wad)

game.name: Ultimate Doom Mod Base.dosz
game.comment: Minimal files from Ultimate Doom v1.9
